#  The Fastest Way to add a Meeting Room Display to Your Office

Works with Office 365, Exchange, & Google Workspace. **$9 per display per
month**.

Get your 30 day Free Trial →

**Try another room:**    Board Room – Dibs Room – Sunny Room (Sidebar) – Lulu
Latte (Sidebar 2) – Space Orbiter (Video BG)

> ### ⭑⭑⭑⭑⭑
>
> “Everyone has been really impressed with your service. We'd definitely
> recommend this to others!” Sam L. - Network Administrator.

> ### ⭑⭑⭑⭑⭑
>
> “Thanks for customizing our display. It looks great! This is a pretty cool
> service so far.” Justin E. - Information Systems Manager.

> ### ⭑⭑⭑⭑⭑
>
> “Thanks for helping us set up our displays, and taking the time to answer
> our questions!” Michael C. - Director of IT.

Read More Reviews on Capterra →

## Easy to Manage

We make managing displays easy.

Provisioning takes just minutes, and doesn't require any technical setup.
Think of all the time you’ll save!

#### Simple to Setup

Setup & provisioning takes just a few quick steps. You'll have your first
tablets up and running in minutes!

#### Instructions Included

Instructions are included for setting up your display. You can also reach out
for help if you get stuck!

## Comprehensive Analytics

Make the most of your meeting room space.

You will see uptime and utilization statistics for your rooms from the Meeting
Room 365 dashboard. Make the most of your existing space, and eliminate the
need to build new conference rooms. We give you simple metrics you can share
with your staff so they can better plan their meeting schedules.

Reduction in Bookings during Peak Hours30%

Reduced Scheduling Confusion80%

## Apps on Every Device

We support more hardware than any other solution.

Not only do we cover the basics, with native apps for iOS, Android, and Amazon
hardware, in all of the major app stores, we support legacy hardware and
systems using a variety of custom apps and web-based display solutions. This
includes older hardware, proprietary hardware, and low-end computing devices.

32k

End Users

4870\+

Displays Online

### Perfect for Building a Custom Solution

All the features you need to manage your meeting room space.

#### Customizable via CSS & JS

Everything you see can be customized. The sky's the limit! Animated or video
backgrounds, slideshows, logos, and custom theme options. Enable instant
reservations, right from the tablet. Localize your display into your own
language. Make your display your own.

#### Private by Default

We take privacy & security very seriously.

Your calendar data is never stored on our servers. And we never share your
personal data with third parties.

#### All the features you need

Meeting Room 365 gives you everything you need to coordinate, schedule, and
organize your meeting rooms. We keep things simple & manageable. Plus, we’ve
got 5 years of uptime under our belt, and haven’t missed any important
meetings yet.

Have Questions? Get in touch with our team, we'll be happy help. Send us an
email and we'll respond within 48hrs →

### Styled to your liking

Customize the logo, graphics, text, & styling.

Pick from dozens of pre-built themes. Localize your displays into your own
language. Make your display your own.

We've released a Theme Builder with Animated backgrounds, and a fresh, new
default theme for Meeting Room displays.

##### Featured

##  Complementary Status Board Display

TV ready

Status board displays are the fastest way for employees to find an available
meeting room, and are easy to add to any hallway or lobby.

Once you set up your Meeting Room displays, you can add an overview display in
a couple of minutes, for free. Save $500+ / year.

* * *

  * ###### Find Rooms Quickly

  * ###### Easy-to-understand Availability

  * ###### List Locations & Equipment

## Simple & Transparent Pricing

Low per-display pricing for self-service accounts, and add-on packages.
Pricing Details →

####  Pricing Options

## Pay-as-you-go

####  $9 / Display / Month

  * Pay just $9 per display per month
  * Native Apps (iOS, Android, Amazon)
  * Email & Chat Support
  * Custom Branding & Styling
  * ~~Large-scale deployment tools~~
  * ~~Phone Support~~

30 Day Free Trial or read more

## Annual Pricing

####  $99 / Display / Year

  * 10% Savings vs. month to month
  * Native Apps (iOS, Android, Amazon)
  * Email & Chat Support
  * Custom Branding & Styling
  * ~~Large-scale deployment tools~~
  * ~~Phone Support~~

30 Day Free Trial or read more

## Add-on Services

####  Contact us for more details

  * Provisioning & Deployment
  * Single-sign on Integrations
  * Phone Support with custom SLA
  * Custom Branding & Design Services
  * Project Planning & MSP Assistance
  * Large-scale deployment tools
